overview: The female lead remarried and went on a trip abroad with her husband. However, she encountered a thief, lost all her valuables, and ran out of electricity on her phone. When she arrived at the hotel she had booked, she found out that she had not made a successful reservation before. In times of adversity, she saw the truth. The remarried husband was a scumbag and quickly left the female lead to mix up with other women. The female lead also received the help of a kind-hearted man, whose goal was to obtain her body, The female protagonist who encounters two scumbag men is very helpless, and at this time of decline, may the appearance of an exotic man just be to deceive the female protagonist into bed
title: Dirty Wedding
